Hey there, my name is Ashlyn and I'm a coffee and typography addict living in Redwood City, CA. Thanks for taking the time to learn more about my design journey. To put it briefly, I've worked on numerous teams varying in size, goals, and talents. While I consider myself a designer, I'm always digging deep into code to push the limits of my creations. Just recently, I started working at Salesforce on their Financial Services Team as a Product Designer.

Previously I worked at Zenefits as an UI Engineer. Here, I focused on building reusable and tested EmberJS components, helped level up Full-Stack Engineers on front-end technologies, and contributed to feature work. Specifically, I worked on the Benefits Plan Shopping Team where I engineered brand new user flows and components.

Before Zenefits I worked at a small startup called iCracked as a Product Designer. Working on a very small Product and Engineering team, I had the unique experience bringing web applications from initial mock ups, all the way to final implementation into production. I also maintained their AngularJS component library and built a custom sass framework that allowed engineers to build basic landing pages quickly.

However, some of my favorite work has been with side projects. Be sure to check out my portfolio to see all the designs and repositories I've contributed too.
